doc.title: phylip

description.text: PHYLIP is a package of programs for inferring phylogenies.

doc.reference: Felsenstein, J. 1993. PHYLIP (Phylogeny Inference Package) version 3.5c. Distributed by the author. Department of Genetics, University of Washington, Seattle.
Felsenstein, J. 1989. PHYLIP -- Phylogeny Inference Package (Version 3.2). Cladistics 5: 164-166.

comment.text: DRAWTREE interactively plots an unrooted tree diagram, with many options including orientation of tree and branches, label sizes and angles, margin sizes. Particularly if you can use your computer screen to preview the plot, you can very effectively adjust the details of the plotting to get just the kind of plot you want.

xhtml:div.div:
Example data (click on [use example data] to load):
(A,(B,(H,(D,(J,(((G,E),(F,I)),C))))));

xhtml:div.label: Which plotter or printer will the tree be drawn on PostScript printer file format (L) PICT format (M) HP Laserjet PCL file format (J) MS-Windows Bitmap (W) TeKtronix 4010 graphics terminal (K) Hewlett-Packard pen plotter (H) DEC ReGIS graphics (D) Houston Instruments plotter (B) Epson MX-80 dot-matrix printer (E) Prowriter/Imagewriter dot-matrix printer (C) Okidata dot-matrix printer (O) Toshiba 24-pin dot-matrix printer (T) PCX file format (P) X Bitmap format (X) FIG 2.0 format (F) Idraw drawing program format (A) VRML Virtual Reality Markup Language file (Z) POVRAY 3D rendering program file (V) Rayshade 3D rendering program file (R)

xhtml:div.label: Paintbrush PCX resolution EGA 640 X 350 (1) VGA 800 X 600 (2) VGA 1024 X 768 (3)
Font (F) Courier Helvetica Helvetica-Bold Helvetica-BoldOblique Helvetica-Oblique Hershey Times Times-Bold Times-BoldItalic Times-Italic Times-Roman
Use branch lengths (B) Yes No
Angle of labels (L) Along (A) Radial (R) Fixed (F) Middle (M)
Fixed angle: Are the labels to be plotted vertically (90), horizontally (0), or downwards (-90) (L)?
Rotation of tree (in degrees from 360 to -360) (R)
Angle of arc for tree (in degrees from 0 to 360) (A)
Iterate to improve tree (I) Equal-Daylight algorithm n-Body algorithm () No

Scale of branch length (S)?
Default value: Automatically rescaled
Try to avoid label overlap (D) Yes No
Horizontal margins (M)
Vertical margins (M)
Relative character height (C)
